column5: Does any one know where i can get the porcelain for this heater does Bass Pro sell parts for this heater  Thanks Rob
Direct is all I've found so far Rob.  http://www.mrheater.com/products.asp?catid=17

I'm pretty sure that BPS doesn't sell the parts for these heaters...as a matter of fact I was there last Thurs and they don't even have any of the heaters left. The sale sold all of them. I went to Princess Auto to get mine. If you look up the manufacturer I'm sure they will be able to help you out.
Hey Rob  I called Jack at Northern machine and repair. He will look it up for me and get back. This guy can get almost anything for me.
Thanks for the site Wayne this looks like the place to get what i need
I just checked out the site. Nice job Wayne. Good price on the tile replacement kit bro.
